title: ‘The Sport’s Too Small to Hold Grudges:’ Caleb Ewan Accepts Tour de France Pause in Jayco-AlUla Comeback
content:
Despite an acrimonious split in 2018, Jayco-AlUla always had an eye on bringing back the Aussie sprinter: 'I always stayed in touch with him.'

Read the full article at ‘The Sport’s Too Small to Hold Grudges:’ Caleb Ewan Accepts Tour de France Pause in Jayco-AlUla Comeback on Velo.
author: ahood
